rooms.description: Open space that serves as the main entry point and transition area.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to capture natural light while respecting Vastu principles by avoiding direct western exposure for main activities.
Separate dining space integrated within the living area for joint family gatherings.
Compact yet efficient kitchen, designed to support joint family cooking with essential appliances and minimalistic design elements.
Private master suite featuring a balcony for fresh air. Aligned away from the west side as per Vastu guidelines to ensure tranquility.
Cozy bedroom designed for joint family members with sufficient natural light and ventilation.
Accommodates guests with minimalistic interiors and floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to harness positive energy.
Functional bathroom space with essential fixtures, designed for privacy.
